report.title: Reality Fishing
report.author: Anonymous
report.bodytext: Citation: Anonymous. 'Reality Fishing'. /n. Winter Solstice 1998;7(4):92. /n /n There have been a few times when I smoked /n and was not sure (and still am not sure) that I really returned to the same reality I left from. Funny little details--like all the people I know being acquainted with an advertising cartoon called /n that I seem to have no recollection of whatsoever. --
